name: d22b897b-7255-52ec-a591-3e82b21d1928
notes: This service provides filter absorption photometer measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Aspvreten, Sweden (20170101 - 20180101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Aspvreten, Sweden (20170101 - 20180101)
